description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) has requirement for OpenText-Exceed TurboX aspects Admin proceeding through.
full_summary:
---

**Free-Form Solicitation**
=========================

**Reference Number**
--------------------

* **SSC-22-00021013 :T**

**Title**
--------

* **BPM017563 - R000128417 - OpenText Exceed TurboX Premium Maintenance**

**Request for Proposal**
------------------------

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking the provision of OpenText Exceed TurboX Premium Maintenance services. The solicitation does not require vendor or personnel security screening. This is a competitive bid based on the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

The key points for submission are listed below:

* **Closing Date**: December 21, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* **Contact Information**: Please submit inquires or emails to [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

**Solicitation Details**
---------------------

The solicitation can be accessed through the following links:

* **English**: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public)
* **French**: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/rfp/request_browse_public)

**Important Notes**

* The solicitation requires the provision of OpenText Exceed TurboX Premium Maintenance services to the Shared Services Canada (SSC).
* The requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The closing date for submissions is December 21, 2022, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST).

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* **Contact Name**: Eric Lavigne
* **Contact Email**: [eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: 343-541-8756
* **Contact Fax**: 613-960-6026
* **Address**: 180 Kent Street Ottawa K1J 4A8 Canada
